attributes.action: Reconsider the recent increase to the minimum age of recruitment of PCSO's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am 16 and have recently had a interview to become a PCSO, within the Avon and Somerset Constabulary but may be thrown out, and forgotten because two weeks after my interview the Home Seceratary raised the minimum age of recruitment of PCSO's to 18. What happened to wanting to increase the numbers of PCSO's by April 2008?

My application is 'Pending'

The home secretary rasied the minimum age to 18 on December 1st, but all PCSO's already working who are under 18 will not be sacked and will continue to work within the police service. Unfair?...

PCSO's play a positive role in our communitites makeing our communitites stronger and safer.
